price: «[Муроқиб бошед] Ки имрӯз ҳеҷ [ниёзманд ва] бенавое дар он [боғ] ворид нашавад!»
arabic: أَن لَّا يَدۡخُلَنَّهَا ٱلۡيَوۡمَ عَلَيۡكُم مِّسۡكِينٞ

version.title: Tajik translation - Arfy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tajik by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: an lā yadkhulannahā al-yawma ʿalaykum mis'kīnun
